intro: Arachne decaisnei, commonly known as the Decaisne's spiderwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the Campanulaceae family. It is native to the mountainous regions of southern Africa, particularly in countries like Namibia and South Africa. The plant is characterized by its delicate, bell-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pale blue. It typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and prefers a sunny to partially shaded environment. Arachne decaisnei is often found in grasslands and on cliffs, where it thrives in well-drained conditions.
